title: Kasumin’s Perfect Plan : Day 6
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Kyaaah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What!? What happened, Dia!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Dia-chan, are you okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>T-, there’s something that looks like a rat inside my bag….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eeh!? That would be a problem!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It would be bad if it chews something in your bag. I’m going to check it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>It’s not safe, Emma-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It’s fine, it’s fine. ….Huh? Isn’t this…. Kasumi-chan’s number 2….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Kasumi-san’s number 2….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>That’s it, huh. Don’t worry, Dia-chan. This is Kasumi-chan’s stuffed animal<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Yaay yaay! Finally, a success-! Were you all surprised?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Geez, I was more surprised by Dia’s scream~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>….I’m sorry….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’m totally fine<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I’m okay too. Buuut~~ It’s so unfair~. I want to prank people too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eeh!? Kasumin is more of the one pranking people and not the one who gets pranked though…. Besides, Kasumin is doing this for a reason….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Kasumi-san, even if there’s a reason for it a prank is still a prank<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>No way!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Then, I’ll give you some light pranks, Kasumi♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ah, are we thinking of the same thing, Mari-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yes, I think we are, Nozomi<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>What is that hand position!? What are you two planning to do surrounding Kasumin like this!? NOOO---!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>That seems fun! Let me join~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Emma-senpai, please help Kasumin---!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
